titles.title: To repeal the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, forgive all outstanding Federal student loans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Education and the Workforce, Natural Resources, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
